results.overview: An exploration of the mythological roots of the Man of Steel.
results.title: The Mythology of Superman

results.original_title: De Superman à Spider-Man: L'aventure des super-héros
results.overview: The historical saga of American superheroes. Born in the period between the Great Depression and the World War II to combat the hobgoblins of the modern world, these mutant human beings with superhuman powers colonized the funny papers, radio dramas, television and films, to become a truly national industry in the United States: they gave expression to the fears and obsessions of the twentieth century and bolstered American ideals.
results.title: Once Upon a Time: The Super Heroes

results.original_title: It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman!
results.overview: TV adaptation of the campy 1960s Broadway musical about the Man of Steel, his friends, his enemies, and his self-image problems.
results.title: It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman!

results.overview: A cloning experiment gone wrong courtesy of Lex Luther, Bizarro now wanders the earth wreaking havoc with all the powers of Superman but none of the goodwill. More misguided than malevolent, Bizarro wages a twisted war against Superman who he sees as an impostor and a threat. Superman will have his hands full as Bizarro runs amok in these three thrilling adventures., This collection of three episodes from the animated Superman series focuses on his nemesis Bizarro. Included are the installments IDENTITY CRISIS, BIZARRO'S WORLD, and LITTLE BIG HEAD MAN.
results.title: Superman Super Villains : Bizarro

results.overview: Documentary about  the death of Superman comics featured in the 2007 DVD Superman Doomsday.
results.title: Requiem & Rebirth: Superman Lives!

results.overview: Ernie Anderson narrates this look at the making of Richard Donner's blockbuster 1978 film. Behind-the-scenes footage, as well as scenes from the film, reveal just how audiences were able to "believe a man can fly." This program features interviews with key cast and crew.
results.title: The Making of 'Superman: The Movie'

results.overview: Kansas City has suffered from hyper-segregation for over 60 years. We Are Superman chronicles the story of Troost Avenue, which lies in the heart of KC. Troost draws a geographic line between black and white, rich and poor. A growing movement unites to transform Troost from a dividing line into a gathering place. On the corner of 31st St. and Troost Ave., a community of people are battling against prejudicial legislation, exploitative corporations, and a stereotype that has stigmatized the urban core since the industrial revolution. This is the story their work, their vision, and how they are no longer waiting on a Superman to come save them.
results.title: We Are Superman

results.overview: Sensitive and handsome Daily Planet reporter Clark Kent sheds the shy guy act whenever someone is in need - particularly when the dainty but tough-as-nails reporter, Lois Lane, needs him.  Everyone will love these beautifully animated 1940s Superman adventures!
results.title: Superman is Here!

results.overview: A tormented young man constructs an ingenious devise to rescue his father from Abu Ghraib prison. What he finds there is far from his expectations, revealing the mistreatment and torture of prisoners. His hopes and dreams for a brighter future are dashed upon finding his father.
results.title: The Iraqi Superman

results.original_title: Superman n'est pas juif (...et moi un peu)
results.overview: When he finds out that it's because he's Jewish that his willy is different, young Benjamin decides to do everything he can to hide his religion and keep his secret...
results.title: Superman Isn't Jewish (...But I Am a Bit)

results.overview: Mr.Superman lives a dual life, uses his superpowers to assist the police, but becomes a suspect himself when impostors implicate him in a crime wave.
results.title: Return of Mr. Superman

results.overview: Andi is a newspaper hawker who is honest and kind-hearted. One day he was helping a sick grandfather. The grandfather gave Andi a magical necklace. When the necklace was kissed, Andi turned to Rama who has superhuman strength and can fly.  One of the customers of the newspaper Andi is Lia. Lia's father was a professor who invented a new explosive. Black Dragon group trying to steal the explosives formula. Lia and her father helped Rama to capture kingpin Black Dragon. (via Google Translate)
results.title: Rama Superman Indonesia

results.overview: This collection of classic cartoons brings the Man of Steel to life to battle foreign agents and natural disasters. Created by pioneering animators Max and Dave Fleischer, each frame was painstakingly traced from live-action footage. The World War II-era shorts include "Jungle Drums," "Terror on the Midway," "Volcano," "Destruction, Inc.," "Eleventh Hour," "Secret Agent," "Japoteurs" and "Showdown." Bud Collyer provides the voice of Superman.
results.title: Superman vs. Nature & War

results.overview: Documentary on the making of the 1978 film 'Superman.'
results.title: Making 'Superman': Filming the Legend

results.overview: These highly elaborate Superman cartoons were produced for Paramount Studios in the 1940's.  The cartoonists, brothers Max and Dave Fleischer, launched their ambitious project featuring great animation and taut, fast-moving plots.  The voices of Budd Collyer and Joan Alexander are featured as Clark Kent/Superman and Lois Lane.
results.title: Cartoon Classics - Superman - Vol.2

results.overview: Marc McClure presents a documentary on the making of 'Superman' (1978).
results.title: Taking Flight: The Development of 'Superman'

results.overview: This documentary treats movie fans to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Superman III, a more comical take on the superhero story in which the Man of Steel takes on a supercomputer and its bumbling programmer. Included are interviews with the cast and crew who share their experiences from making the film, as well as disscuss the efforts that went into it.
results.title: The Making of 'Superman III'

results.overview: Vietnamese gangsters, bleach, and ammonia don’t mix well.
results.title: I Can't Be Your Superman
